scenarios.context: User is a casting director setting up a new OTT series

dialogue.speaker: user
dialogue.message: I need to cast a new show

dialogue.speaker: ai
dialogue.message: Great! I'll help you set up your new casting project. What's the name of your show?

dialogue.speaker: user
dialogue.message: It's called Mumbai Dreams

dialogue.speaker: ai
dialogue.message: Perfect! Tell me a bit about Mumbai Dreams. Is this for an OTT Series, Feature Film, Web Series, or Commercial?

dialogue.speaker: user
dialogue.message: OTT series for Netflix

dialogue.speaker: ai
dialogue.message: Excellent! A Netflix series. Which production house is behind this project? I can help you add their details.

dialogue.speaker: user
dialogue.message: Dharma Productions

dialogue.speaker: ai
dialogue.message: Great choice! Dharma Productions has an excellent track record. What's your target release timeline? This helps me prioritize urgent casting needs.

dialogue.speaker: user
dialogue.message: We need to start shooting in 3 months

dialogue.speaker: ai
dialogue.message: Understood - shooting starts in 3 months, so we need to move quickly on casting. Let's define the key roles. You can tell me about them naturally, like 'I need a male lead, 25-35, intense character' or upload your script/breakdown.

scenarios.context: Experienced user wants fast setup using previous project as template

dialogue.speaker: user
dialogue.message: New project, similar to Sacred Games

dialogue.speaker: ai
dialogue.message: I'll use Sacred Games Season 2 as a template. What's your new project called?

dialogue.speaker: user
dialogue.message: City of Shadows

dialogue.speaker: ai
dialogue.message:
City of Shadows - I've imported the structure from Sacred Games. Here's what I've set up:

- Crime thriller genre
- 8 episode series
- 5 primary roles, 12 supporting
- Mumbai & Delhi locations
- Similar budget range

What would you like to modify?

scenarios.context: User gets interrupted during setup and returns later

dialogue.speaker: ai
dialogue.message: Welcome back! You were setting up 'Mumbai Dreams' yesterday. You'd defined 3 roles but hadn't set the budget yet. Should we continue from there?

dialogue.speaker: user
dialogue.message: Yes, continue

dialogue.speaker: ai
dialogue.message: Perfect! We have your Male Lead (25-35), Female Lead (22-30), and Supporting Actor (40-50) defined. Now, what's your casting budget range? This stays confidential and helps me suggest appropriate talent.
